title: Understanding HPLC
text: High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) is a technique used to separate, identify, and quantify components in a mixture. It is an advanced form of liquid chromatography.

title: Why Use HPLC?
text: HPLC is preferred over traditional liquid chromatography because it offers higher resolution, faster analysis times, and better sensitivity.

hintAnswer: Higher resolution and faster analysis times
title: Key Advantage of HPLC
text: What is a key advantage of using HPLC over traditional liquid chromatography?
choices: Higher resolution and faster analysis times
